title: How to read Pratiyogita Darpan, for CLAT preparation purposes for current affairs, and which page is important - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello, As far as CLAT is concerned, nowadays the General Knowledge section comprises mostly of the current affairs.(And by that I mean, current) Rather than reading in-depth news, I would suggest you to stay updated with the current affairs by reading newspaper daily and finding out the important issues. Sports event particularly Grandslam of tennis, Election of new head in any country are some of common questions. Thanks.
